headline: Agoda Unveils 2026 Travel Outlook Report: Key Trends for Industry Partners to Capitalize on the Year Ahead
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda unveils its 2026 Travel Outlook Report, highlighting data-driven trends set to influence travel across Asia in the next year. Drawing on a survey of Agoda customers in key Asia-Pacific markets, the report spotlights shifts such as the rising popularity of secondary destinations, the increasing demand for experiential travel and growing expectations for seamless, technology-driven journeys. The findings offer strategic insights and guidance for hotels, destination ma
